game.name: GIGA WRECKER
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, Partial Controller Support, Steam Cloud, Includes level editor, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: 인간 이상의 존재가 되어 세계 멸망으로부터 인류를 구하세요! 전설적인 개발사 Game Freak이 선사하는 아주 특별한 액션 어드벤처. 주변 세상을 조작하고 사악한 아지트를 산산조각내세요!
game.shortDescriptionEn: Become more than human and save mankind from total annihilation! From legendary developer Game Freak comes an action adventure like no other - manipulate the world around you and smash the evil Ajeet to smithereens!

reviewHighlights.text: it's that good type of Game Freak jank where yeah the death might not be your fault or the graphics may not be on point but it's fun af in spite of it
i usually like 2d platformers but something about the characters movement and stuff just didnt gel with me. shame
